headerDisplay: Configure one or more Winix air purifiers below
footerDisplay: For help finding your device id, see [here](https://github.com/regaw-leinad/homebridge-winix-purifiers#device-ids)

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Authentication settings for your Winix purifiers. These values are gathered from the login process and are not editable in the UI.

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: The refresh token for your Winix account

exposeAirQuality.title: Air Quality Sensor
exposeAirQuality.description: Whether or not to expose the air quality sensors to HomeKit

exposeAmbientLight.title: Ambient Light Sensor
exposeAmbientLight.description: Whether or not to expose the ambient light sensors to HomeKit

exposePlasmawave.title: Plasmawave Switch
exposePlasmawave.description: Whether or not to expose switches for Plasmawave on/off

exposeAutoSwitch.title: Auto Switch
exposeAutoSwitch.description: Whether or not to expose switches for Auto mode on/off

cacheIntervalSeconds.title: Winix Response Cache Interval (seconds)
cacheIntervalSeconds.description: Time, in seconds, for how long to reuse cached responses from Winix
